patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.14.0
patchlogs.changes:
Weapon Range Mods (like Sinister Reach) no longer affect the distance of chains for chainable Beam weapons (like the Amprex). Main Beam distance is still affected by them.
Amprex magazine capacity reduced to 40 in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Amprex FX script that could crash if owner was killed on the first frame after firing.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed script crash for firing an Amprex and being killed at a specific moment while holding the trigger.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.5
patchlogs.changes: Amprex 100 to 40

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview
patchlogs.changes: Amprex, Flux Rifle, Glaxion, Embolist, Gammacor series, Nukor, Spectra, Panthera, Synapse, Sobek, Drakgoon and Lanka can now be used in Conclave!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.8.2
patchlogs.changes: •    Decreased the rumble amount on controllers when continuously firing the Atomos, Gammacor, Glaxion, and Amprex.•    Changed the damage radius of hull breaches in Corpus tilesets to affect the entire room, not just a small area near the breach. Fixing in another Hotfix.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some lingering visual FX from Atomos/Amprex when used with Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/518981-atomos-beam-glitch-with-mirage-hom/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.3
patchlogs.changes: PBR material has been added to the Amprex!

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Sinister Reach will now extend the Amprex’s chain lightning effect.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.11
patchlogs.fixes: Damage multipliers for the Amprex, Brakk, Drakgoon, Karak, Hind, Marelok, Mutalist Quanta, Tysis, AkLato, Burston Prime, Lato, Braton, Tetra, Tigris all normalized (no more arbitrary multipliers).

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the reload animation for the Amprex not properly coinciding with when the magazine was refilled.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.1.2
patchlogs.changes: Improved the performance of the Amprex on low end machines.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the visuals on the battery component of the Amprex rifle.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.1.0: Amprex
patchlogs.fixes:
New Amprex Rifle A Corpus Chain Lightning Rifle!
The Amprex Rifle fires a continuous beam of high voltage electricity that arcs among nearby enemies. This weapon excels at crowd control.

patchlogs.name: The Old Blood: Hotfix 26.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lanka, Opticor, Helios, Convectrix & Arca Plasmor Research missing from the Energy Lab.

patchlogs.name: Update 26: The Old Blood
patchlogs.changes: Please note that we are monitoring item usage for other weapons who use similar projectiles (Fulmin / Arca Plasmor), but will provide notice before we consider changing anything. We are simply monitoring at this phase.

patchlogs.name: Prime Vault: Hotfix 25.7.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Catchmoon Kitguns, Arca Plasmor, and a few other weapons not being able to damage the Ropalolyst Synovia.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue that made Arca Plasmor, Fulmin and Catchmoon projectiles deal damage twice on the hit when the projectile is destroyed. This was not a case of ‘always worked this way’ as it was accidentally introduced by the Jovian Concord.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Update 24.0
patchlogs.changes: Note from [DE]Megan: I’m personally an Arca Plasmor devotee, and after testing comparisons, it truly remains a radiated plasma punch to the face.

patchlogs.name: Chimera: Hotfix 23.10.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Arca Plasmor's projectiles bouncing off walls instead of exploding on impact.

patchlogs.name: Chimera: Update 23.10
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed certain wave projectiles (e.g. Arca Plasmor) bouncing off hit proxy shields (e.g. Volt’s Electric Shield, Gara’s Mass Vitrify).

patchlogs.name: Mask of the Revenant: Update 23.8.0 + 23.8.0.1 + 23.8.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inability to damage Revenant’s Enthralled enemies with the Arca Plasmor.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.changes: The Arca Plasmor received a change yesterday where headshots no longer deal bonus damage. The Arca Plasmor was designed to hit multiple targets with a high-status chance, but with wide wave projectiles and inherent punch-through, a single shot could result in multiple headshots. With it being a shotgun, it was never intended to behave as a precision weapon, and the bonus pushed it too far out of that mold.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the projectile width of the Arca Plasmor.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Arca Plasmor disintegrating the Teralyst.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed the weapon trail from the Arca Plasmor being offset to the barrel. 
Fixed Zephyr’s Tornados turning invisible when shot with the Arca Plasmor.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Arca Plasmor not damaging enemy weak spots (Lephantis, Sargas Ruk, etc).

name: Basmu

patchlogs.name: Nightwave Series 3: Glassmaker: Hotfix 27.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Basmu reload not providing Health if you’re the Client.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Railjack Revisited (Part 1): Update 27.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Basmu’s firing sound FX from other players.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inability to equip Flight Speed Mods, such as Terminal Velocity, on the Basmu.

patchlogs.name: Scarlet Spear: 27.3.16
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Basmu's healing pulse receiving exponential copies of equipped Mods with each pulse when under the effect of some conditional buffs, which led to unintended amounts of damage.

patchlogs.name: Scarlet Spear: TennoGen 27.3.9
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed becoming invincible when interrupting the Basmu reload and Transferring to the Operator and using Unairu Void Spines.
Another fix towards all future Basmu damage dealing lifesteal to enemies if the ‘heal on reload’ is interrupted as a Client.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: TennoGen 27.3.8 + 27.3.8.1 + 27.3.8.2
patchlogs.changes: Removed the replication of the Basmu reload Health FX so that only the user will see the FX to aid in performance.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Shedu and Basmu reload FX being visible while invisible.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: Titania Prime 27.3.6
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Basmu Alt Fire mode not healing on reload.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: Hotfix 27.3.5
patchlogs.changes: Fixed all future Basmu damage dealing lifesteal to enemies if the ‘heal on reload’ is interrupted. This had to be timed very correctly by actions such as Transferring to the Operator, casting Abilities, etc.

patchlogs.name: The Steel Path: Inaros Prime 28.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to open the pause menu after setting up a trade shop in Maroo's Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Update 27.2.0
patchlogs.additions: Trading is an essential part of Warframe and we felt it important to inform players on how to proceed with trading in a safe manner. All players will be presented with the “Trading Policy” window when trading for the first time ever (Mastery Rank 2 players who have just unlocked trading), and for the first time since downloading the update. This applies to any instance of trading in the Dojo and in Maroo’s Bazaar. Once you’ve accepted the Policy you may access it from the “Trading Policy” button when trading if desired.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Aksomati Prime and Baza Prime having the same Riven Disposition as their normal variants despite the UI displaying their correct Disposition of 1.

You can find Ivara Prime, Baza Prime, and Aksomati Prime Relics in their classic spots (Void, Derelict, Defense, Survival, etc) with the addition of Railjack missions

Reduced the delay before auto reloading an empty mag while using the Baza.

patchlogs.changes:
*Baza and Cassowar Blueprints can be researched in your Clan Dojo’s Tenno Lab.
*The Baza Collection is available for purchase in the In-Game Market.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed all cases of Maroo’s Bazaar being located on Earth instead of Mars.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Maroo's Bazaar is now located on Mars.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.5.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed sell screen for Ayatan Sculptures and Prime Parts in Maroo’s Bazaar/Relay showing all items.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.3.0
patchlogs.changes: Maroo's prompt will now always overlap players' shop prompt in Maroo’s Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Octavia’s emote music at times suddenly changing volume in the Relay and Maroo’s Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Octavia not playing her music when dancing in Maroo's Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes:
The Relays and Maroo’s Bazaar now offer dedicated music zones, where you can share your Mandachord compositions and boogie down with fellow Tenno. Simply bring Octavia to one of the areas marked with the symbol seen in the image below, and select any of the Narta emotes listed above to start the party.
Trading in the Dojo now works similarly to trading in the Maroo's Bazaar where players can "set up shop". The trading post still shows all players in the Dojo with trades remaining for the day, but Players can now start a trade from the Trading Post or by interacting with another Player who is in trading mode.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Player Store preview in Maroo’s Bazaar only showing the first item for sale after the initial cycle, as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/763514-maroos-bazaar-is-practically-unusable-now/
Fixed Clan Dojo UI showing “Conclave” instead of “Earth” if a clanmate was in Maroo’s Bazaar.
Fixed the Citadella Syandana VFX lingering on other players when talking to Maroo in Maroo’s Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.13.1
patchlogs.changes: Those that have been trade-banned or are below the minimum Mastery Rank for trading can now enter Maroo’s Bazaar to trade Ayatan for Endo from Maroo, but trading with other players in the Bazaar will not be accessible.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Maroo can now be interrupted if you want to progress the conversation in her Bazaar!

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inconsistent terminology and grammar in Maroo’s Bazaar and elsewhere.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Removed the Credit cost from Maroo's Ayatan to Endo conversion in Maroo's Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.2 + 19.3.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players not showing up on minimap in Relays & Maroo’s Bazaa.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a loss of functionality in Maroo's Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: You can now go to Maroo’s Bazaar even if you have reached your daily trade limit. This fixes players unable to do the Ayatan Sculpture mission due to reaching their trade limit.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mods that are being sold by a player in Maroo’s Bazaar appearing jittery and having a ‘Conclave’ text.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an unresponsive screen due to Clients returning to their Liset and Hosts returning to Maroos Bazaar after completing an Ayatan Sculpture hunt mission.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.8.2
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed Maroo’s name not being translated in the Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.7.0
patchlogs.additions: •    You can now move around in Maroo’s Bazaar while in Vendor mode! Please note that a message will prompt that you’ve been kicked out of Vendor mode if you leave the trading area.
patchlogs.changes: •    Improved the visual FX of the ‘Trade’ button in Maroo’s Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.5.4
patchlogs.changes: •    Chat is now enabled in 'Vendor Mode' in Maroo's Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Players can now advertise XP locked items when setting up shop in Maroo’s Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed trade icons in Maroo’s Bazaar showing as a white box.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players being able to unintentionally create multiple trade windows while in vendor mode in Maroo’s Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.8
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed trade emotes exclusive to Maroo’s Bazaar being equippable for use outside of Maroo’s Bazaar.
Fixed players not being able to see new players entering the trading zone within Maroo’s Bazaar.
Fixed a visual bug causing players to see other players floating through the air in Maroo’s Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.6 + 18.0.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Slightly adjusted the size of trade icons in Maroo’s Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Removed Navigation and Conclave options from Maroo’s Bazaar.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed some areas of Maroo’s Bazaar that would not properly allow players to trade.
Fixed Arsenal and Mod screens not appearing properly in Maroo’s Bazaar.
Fixed an error that would occur in Maroo’s Bazaar that would prevent players from being able to Trade after opening their Trade menu.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error that would occur when clicking ‘Tutorial’ in the Ducat Kiosk at Maroo’s Bazaar. We've since removed any functionality these kiosks have save for Baro count-down.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.additions:
Maroo’s Bazaar: Found on Earth, Maroo’s Bazaar is a place where players can go to trade or advertise their goods.
Normal trade limitations are still in place for Trades done through Maroo’s Bazaar.

patchlogs.name: Update 28: The Deadlock Protocol
patchlogs.changes: Nef Anyo claims to have found an heir to the long-deceased Corpus Founder, Parvos Granum, and has the means to prove it. The Solaris have begun disappearing in droves and Eudico thinks it has something to do with Nef’s power play. Whoever they are, the heir to the Founder would be able to solve the stalemate and stage a total takeover of the Corpus Board. If Nef Anyo has anything to do with it, that spells bad news for the Solaris.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Railjack Revisited (Part 1): Update 27.4
patchlogs.changes: Added support to Sword & Board skins to have consistent main-hand holster positions and scaling regardless of base weapon.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue where using "Board Railjack" / "Return to Orbiter" from the top menu while not close to the action itself would fail to execute it.
Fixed issue where Sword & Board weapon Skins would not preview with the shield opened.

patchlogs.name: Scarlet Spear: 27.3.11
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when a Boarding Party comes knockin.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: Hotfix 27.3.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ramsleds trying to initiate a Boarding Party after the mission is complete.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: 27.3.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed inability to disengage bombs placed by Grineer Boarding Parties if a Host migration occurs during a Railjack mission.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Ivara Prime 27.0.12 + 27.0.12.1
patchlogs.changes: Sharing is caring! Loot gathered when on-foot in a Point of Interest, Crewship, and from killing a Boarding Party are now shared between the whole squad, so you don’t individually need to go collect the loot if you’re busy Piloting, Engineering, etc!

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Ivara Prime 27.0.11 - 27.0.11.3
patchlogs.changes: An example of this situation would be if the mission succeeded while a Boarding Party was still aboard, but not fully dealt with until after the mission success popup.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Hotfix 27.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Grineer Railjack Boarding Party having some incorrect Melee FX.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Update 27
patchlogs.fixes: You can enter your Railjack from the Dry Dock itself, via the Railjack express console at the back of your Orbiter (located just outside the Personal Quarters area), or by accessing the “Board Railjack” option in the Menu from your Orbiter (option to “Return to Orbiter” is also available while on the Railjack!).

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some cables that were deemed unsafe by the Corpus Workplace Safety Board.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.6
patchlogs.changes: Nova Prime, Mag Prime, Soma Prime, Boar Prime, Dakra Prime, and Vasto Prime Relics have been added to Plains of Eidolon Bounties, Orb Vallis Bounties, and in the Void drop table.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Update 24.0
patchlogs.changes: These components do not offer any stat bonuses, but the Board will earn you Mastery when you rank up your K-Drive -

Increased the ammo pool of the Boar series in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.additions: Drekar Troopers now have a chance to drop the Boar Blueprint.
patchlogs.fixes:
Unique Tennogen Avatars and the Boar have now arrived!  The Boar makes its triumphant return with a fresh new visual overhaul.  Previous Boar owners will automatically have their weapons visually upgraded, but if you haven't picked up the classic shotgun before now's the time to try out its devastating power.
Find the Boar and our community-created Tennogen Avatars in the Market today!

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: One of Warframe’s biggest appeals is the diverse selection of weaponry. Even within the subclasses of rifles and pistols, there is huge variety to be found, such as the distinction between projectile weapons (firing physical projectiles which move through space, like the Boltor) and hitscan weapons (firing draws an imaginary line between the gun and the point aimed at, doing damage instantly to whatever it hits, like the Soma). For obvious reasons, hitscans are very effective at long distances

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Buzlok and Twin Gremlin being unable to equip Terminal Velocity or the Lethal Momentum Mods.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue with Buzlok Rifle shots not adding damage to an ally using Nyx's Absorb.
Fixed the Buzlok's homing projectiles having strange bounce angles when using punch-through mods.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where swapping shoulders with the Buzlok resulted in the projectile embedding to the right of the reticule, where the unswapped reticule was aiming.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.8.1
patchlogs.additions: Added audio cues to the Buzlok homing mechanism for when a ‘lock’ is initiated and a ‘lock’ is lost.
patchlogs.changes: Buzlok homing beacon hit effect updated to not cause blood/shield visual effects as it does no damage, therefore no effects need exist.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.7.4
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed multi-shot mods causing Buzlok to fire an extra homing beacon.
Fixed Buzlok's homing beacon firing from wrong position when using scope sights.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.7.3 + 14.7.3.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with client fire accuracy on the Buzlok.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.7.2
patchlogs.fixes:
Buzlok Homing Beacon is now a silent projectile.
Adjusted equipped position of Buzlok.
Fixed an issue where Buzlok can cause player to do diving jump animation when not zoomed in.
Fixed a Buzlok issue where beacons would not always destroy when target died.
Fixed the Buzlok homing beacon not replicating properly on Client.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.7.0: Operation Gate Crash!
patchlogs.fixes: New Buzlok! An advanced Grineer Rifle equipped with specialized homing rounds, always capable of finding their mark.

patchlogs.name: Update 28: The Deadlock Protocol
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the hit FX of the Cernos Prime and Paris Prime.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Railjack Revisited (Part 1): Hotfix 27.4.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mutalist Cernos and Pox Damage over Time applying self-damage.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: 27.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inability to install Catalysts on certain weapons (Cernos, Opticor, etc).

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Hotfix 27.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Increased Cernos Prime 10% Status Chance per projectile to 30% Status Chance per projectile.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Update 27
patchlogs.changes:
Cernos: 1.15->1.25
Rakta Cernos: 1.15->1.2
Cernos Prime: 1.15->1.2

patchlogs.name: Saint of Altra: Update 25.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Cernos Prime equipped with Heavy Caliber causing Vertical Spread mode to function as a Horizontal Spread.

patchlogs.name: Prime Vault: Hotfix 25.3.3 + 25.3.3.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Cernos Prime arrows fired by Mirage's Hall of Mirrors clones always hitting the floor.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Ballistica (Prime/Rakta), Cernos (Prime), Daikyu, Dread, and Paris Prime Energy color persisting as default on the strings.

patchlogs.name: Chimera: Hotfix 23.10.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed cases of Arbitration boons not being applied to Prime Warframe variants. This applies to weapon variants as well (Cernos vs Rakta Cernos).

patchlogs.name: Chimera: Update 23.10
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed changing the color of a Cernos weapon resulting in the bow string to be loose and then pulled back.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Cernos Prime’s vertical spread not using equipped arrow Skins.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Cernos Prime Alt Fire is now silent as intended.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed numerous projectile weapons (Detron, Drakgoon, Cernos Prime, etc) having incorrect Status Chance calculations.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed reload circle turning blue after using a Charge trigger type weapon (Drakgoon, Rakta Cernos, etc). The intended color is white when reloading.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue where Mutalist Cernos poison clouds quick shots were doing more damage than charged shots.  We also reduced the duration of quick shot poison clouds.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an extra word appearing for the description of the Cernos Rakta when viewing in French.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed constant pulsing of the crosshair from Mutalist Cernos and Pox DOT.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mods with negative Accuracy not affecting the Cernos Prime’s spread.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Bow Dryad Skin not applying correctly to the Rakta Cernos.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.changes:
Valkyr Prime, Cernos Prime, and Venka Prime have been added to the Codex and are now linkable in chat. 
Reduced the damage of Cernos Prime in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.0.7 - Valkyr Prime
patchlogs.additions: For a limited time, get Valkyr Prime, Venka Prime, and Cernos Prime – PLUS discounted Platinum, Valkyr Prime Avatars, and Exclusive Prime Gear!

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview
patchlogs.changes: Increased damage done by the poison cloud left behind by Mutalist Cernos in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update: Lunaro
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed the Mutalist Cernos not creating toxin clouds as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/654080-no-cloud-mutalist-cernos/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.10.5
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed the Rakta Cernos appearing as it’s default Cernos skin when equipping an Arrow skin.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed the Mutalist Cernos and Talons consuming the same ammo pool.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.6.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Only one embedded Mutalist Cernos arrow will persist for each player.
Fixed the Mutalist Cernos not dealing damage to Saryn’s spores, preventing them from being spread.
Fixed the default Infested Cernos arrow visual FX being set to blue instead of yellow.
Fixed the Mutalist Cernos visual FX only appearing for a few seconds when used with Ivara’s Navigator.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.6
patchlogs.fixes:
Paris, Paris Prime, and Cernos series charged shot flight speed has been increased 50% in Conclave.
Fixed the Mutalist Cernos’ swarm visual FX not properly appearing.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Slightly adjusted the Mutalist Cernos’ draw rate audio FX.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Increased the damage of Cernos in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes:
Paris, Paris Prime and Cernos damage has been adjusted to two charged shot kill against the highest base EHP with +EHP mods in Conclave.
Rakta Cernos damage has been adjusted to three charged shot kill against the highest base EHP with +EHP mods in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes: Charged projectile speed increased for Paris, Paris Prime, Daikyu and Cernos in PvP.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Cernos not sitting properly on players backs.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Rakta Cernos not properly playing its draw charge audio FX.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.changes: The Penta, Hek, and Cernos can now be used in PvP.
patchlogs.fixes: Red Veil: Rakta Cernos

patchlogs.name: Update 17.1.0 - 17.1.4
patchlogs.fixes: • Fixed Oberon and Rhino always having a Cernos equipped as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/461224-cernos-bow-wont-leave-my-oberons-left-hand/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Cernos’ holster position impaling Chroma when Chroma uses Effigy.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the draw radius and shot radius on Paris, Paris Prime, Cernos, and Daikyu. Before, players were able to hear you draw your bow from considerably far away distances that would give away your position.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Cernos has been given the PBR treatment!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 11.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Cernos string bug (https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/151847-cernos-string-doesnt-relax/)

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 11.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Cernos Bow offhand attachment showing an arrow incorrectly.

patchlogs.name: Update 11.3.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Cernos not playing firing sound.

patchlogs.name: Derelict Shift: Update 28.3.0
patchlogs.changes: Made a slight boost to the muzzle flash size to improve visibility on Corinth Prime.

patchlogs.name: The Deadlock Protocol: Hotfix 28.0.6 + 28.0.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect Corinth Prime reload sounds if the Solstice Skin is equipped.

patchlogs.name: The Deadlock Protocol: Hotfix 28.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Corinth Air Burst Alt Fire Status Chance stat UI displaying a value less than expected.

patchlogs.name: Update 28: The Deadlock Protocol
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Corinth Prime’s custom reload animations not appearing correctly when equipped with Skins. 
Fixed wonky Corinth reload animation after reloading and rolling at the same time. As reported here: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1168417-painful-looking-corinth-animation-bug/

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Railjack Revisited (Part 1): Update 27.4
patchlogs.changes: Made some slight changes to Corinth Prime’s sound mix.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Corinth Prime playing an Alt Fire animation that does no damage if only 3 shots are left with no Ammo remaining.

patchlogs.name: Scarlet Spear: 27.3.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Corinth/Corinth Prime Alt fire grenades shooting out sideways.

patchlogs.name: Scarlet Spear: 27.3.11
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Corinth Prime alt-fire Projectile having incorrect orientation.

patchlogs.name: Scarlet Spear: TennoGen 27.3.10
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed holding the Corinth Prime incorrectly if the Solstice Skin is equipped on it.

patchlogs.name: Scarlet Spear: TennoGen 27.3.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Corinth Prime Alt Fire not being affected by Multishot Mods.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: TennoGen 27.3.8 + 27.3.8.1 + 27.3.8.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Corinth Prime missing its pump action animation.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: Titania Prime 27.3.6
patchlogs.changes: You can find Titania Prime, Corinth Prime, and Pangolin Prime Relics in their classic spots (Void, Derelict, Defense, Survival, etc) with the addition of Railjack missions. PLUS the Relic rewards from Ground Assault and Murex Raid missions have been replaced by these new Relics in Operation: Scarlet Spear. Check your in-game Codex for Relic drop locations!

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Hotfix 27.2.2
patchlogs.changes: Corinth and Kuva Bramma remain unchanged.

patchlogs.name: Rising Tide: Update 26.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Corinth being attached to your Warframe’s left hand in an awkward position if reload was interrupted.

patchlogs.name: Saint of Altra: Update 25.7.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed shotgun shells floating if Corinth’s reload was interrupted. 
Fixed Mirage’s Hall of Mirror clones sometimes using their Primary Fire instead of Alt Fire for the Corinth and Euphona Prime. 
Fixed reload circle filling instantly for weapons that reload individually (Zarr and Corinth), instead of filling up individually for each round loaded.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Corinth Mastery Rank requirement reduced to 8 from 10.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.7 + 24.2.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed lingering FX on the Corinth Alt-Fire.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Mesa Prime - Hotfix 24.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed occasional missing reload sounds for the Corinth.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Corinth reloading only one shell when spamming the alt-fire button without having enough ammo to fire or having Auto Swap On Empty disabled.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Corinth showing Astilla model on the ground when disarmed.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed only reloading 1 bullet (instead of the whole magazine) if you use alt fire on the Corinth while reloading the first bullet.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed alt-fire short circuiting reload loops. This was specifically happening with the Corinth.

Daikyu Conclave Skin

patchlogs.changes: Spring Loaded Broadhead (Daikyu)

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Daikyu making a firing sound before fully charged.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Ormolu Skins for your Daikyu, Akbolto, Bolto and Tipedo Weapons as well as the Ormolu Kyroptera Syandana will add an honorable brass and gold finish.
Fixed the Daikyu having no charge limit in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Daikyu killing the client if being drawn during a Host Migration.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Daikyu’s damage has been decreased in PvP.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed the Daikyu becoming locked in a full draw animation when sprinting.
Fixed Daikyu’s charged shots causing odd animations when turning to aim.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Daikyu bow being pulled and causing clipping issues while sprinting.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the draw radius and shot radius on Paris, Paris Prime, Cernos, and Daikyu. Before, players were able to hear you draw your bow from considerably far away distances that would give away your position.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Daikyu bow string not being properly placed in players hands until after initial shot.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.5: Tubemen Of Regor
patchlogs.fixes:
Boltace Tonfa, Daikyu Bow and Atomos Particle Cannon available now!
Tenno, master three new additions to the Warframe Arsenal! Equip the Boltace tonfa, Daikyu bow or Atomos particle cannon to bring destruction to the enemy.
DAIKYU:  The Daikyu takes great strength to draw back, but provides added power and range to every shot.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Update 27.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Slightly increased the size of Garuda’s Dread Mirror shield.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Kuva Lich Changes 27.1.0 + 27.1.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Garuda charging her Dread Heart at full strength from any amount of Energy regen.

patchlogs.name: Rising Tide: Update 26.1
patchlogs.changes:
Added a projectile explosion range FX to Garuda’s Dread Mirror blood projectile for the local player (one doing the casting) so you can see your output.
Fixed motion blur on Garuda's Dread Mirror.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.1.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Garuda’s Dread Mirror duration not refreshing after re-casting.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Update 25.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed typo in Garuda’s Dread Mirror Arsenal stats.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Ballistica (Prime/Rakta), Cernos (Prime), Daikyu, Dread, and Paris Prime Energy color persisting as default on the strings.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.3 + 24.1.3.1
patchlogs.changes:
Capped Garuda's Dread Mirror and Blood Altar dashes to 150m/s max. No more going going 42km/s anymore.
Fixed Dread Mirror’s dash causing players to get stuck. 
Fixed delay between the end of Garuda's Seeking Talons release animation and being able to charge her Dread Mirror.
Fixed (maybe) Blood Altar and Dread Mirror falling through the floor. 
Fixed Garuda Dread Mirror failing to cast because of TARGET OBSTRUCTED when the leap into the air would clear whatever obstruction was blocking her.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.2 + 24.1.2.1
patchlogs.changes:
Added an 8 meter area-of-effect stagger when reaching a target with Dread Mirror (not affected by Mods).
Added a small noise movement to the Dread Mirror shield.
Charging Dread Mirror projectile while in the air will let you hover for a few seconds.
Dread Mirror animations play faster with Natural Talent equipped.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when casting Garuda’s Dread Mirror.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Update 24.1.0 - TennoGen Round 14
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Terra Provisors being able to damage you through Garuda’s Dread Mirror.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.9
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Garuda’s Dread Mirror blood projectile damage indicator disappearing if the player Transfers to Operator and back.
Fixed Garuda’s Dread Mirror blood projectile outright killing Vomvalysts, as opposed to creating a “ghost” on death.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Garuda’s Dread Mirror not functioning properly when using a controller with activate selected power button or "classic controls".

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Natural Talent Mod now applies to Garuda’s Dread Mirror and Seeking Talons ability.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Returned the Dread's charged shot to 20% status chance as intended.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Dread stat UI in the Arsenal unintentionally displaying reduced Crit Chance and Multiplier (back to original values now). Please note this affects almost all projectile based weapons and is solely a UI bug. We are fixing the rest shortly!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.3.1 + 18.3.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Dread’s Conclave stats not reading properly in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.changes: Dread is now available for use in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Update 27.2.0

patchlogs.name: Wukong Deluxe: Update 25.5.0 + 25.5.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed broken functionality if the Ferrox is the only weapon equipped and you pick up Ammo while it’s been thrown.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Update 25.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed seeing a large beam of light FX when firing the Ferrox with Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors active as reported here:

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Returned the Ferrox Primary Fire Damage to it’s previous value of 350.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.14.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ash’s Shuriken applying numerous Slash Status Effects to every enemy (even ones not hit) if in a group together (using Ferrox’s Alt Fire to group enemies closely).

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.11.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed AI (Rescue Targets, Specters, etc) not being able to use the Ferrox.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.8.0 + Hotfix 22.8.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ferrox primary projectiles sometimes not appearing when in Limbo's Cataclysm and Stasis.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ferrox’s projectiles not affected by Limbo’s Stasis and shooting in whatever direction the first shot was fired.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Javlok and the Ferrox alt fire playing their holstering animation after throwing.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when throwing the Ferrox.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed playing a holstering animation after throwing the Javlok or Ferrox.
Fixed the Opticor and Ferrox not dealing any damage if it was fired inside Limbo's Stasis as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/791540-opticor-limbos-stasis-bugged/
Fixed a script error with the Ferrox.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.4.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a memory leak when throwing the Javlok/Ferrox in Limbo’s Stasis.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Ferrox research not having a Clan Affinity value in the Dojo.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes: Javlok, Buzlok, Ferrox, Harpak, Hind, Mutalist Quanta, Penthera, Paracyst, Penta, Quanta (Vandal), Stradavar, Tenora, Zarr
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed a visual bug for Clients where the charged shots of the Opticor, Angstrum, Javlok, or Ferrox would appear to fire twice.
Fixed the Scanner reticule persisting when holstering after throwing the Ferrox.
Fixed the Ferrox not being affected by Heavy Caliber.
Fixed enemies becoming un-tethered with Titania’s Lantern ability and the Ferrox with Tether Grenades equipped.
Fixed a persisting lensflare after picking up the Ferrox.
Fixed the Ferrox primary fire death dissolve VFX not playing for Clients.
Fixed the Ferrox not returning (after timing out) to you in a shrunken state.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.13.1
patchlogs.changes: Increased the amount of the Ferrox pull force to prevent enemies from meleeing out of the tether.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Clients being able to throw multiple Javloks and Ferroxs which are then unable to be picked back up.
Fixed a script error when throwing the Ferrox.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Discharge a rail of ionized death or throw the Ferrox like a spear and create a localized field of attraction no enemy can escape from!
Visit the Market or the Energy Lab in your Dojo to start the Ferrox research now!

patchlogs.name: Update 26: The Old Blood
patchlogs.changes: Please note that we are monitoring item usage for other weapons who use similar projectiles (Fulmin / Arca Plasmor), but will provide notice before we consider changing anything. We are simply monitoring at this phase.

patchlogs.changes:
Terminal Velocity can now be used with the Fulmin.
Aligned Fulmin's auto fire mode FX to better align with muzzle.

Fixed issue with Fulmin silencer not properly attaching to player's hand when exiting Submersible Archwing if the weapon was previously in Alt-Fire mode.
Fixed zoom multiplier issues with the Fulmin as reported here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Warframe/comments/btea7g/the_fulmin_doesnt_respond_well_to_being_unequipped/

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue that made Arca Plasmor, Fulmin and Catchmoon projectiles deal damage twice on the hit when the projectile is destroyed. This was not a case of ‘always worked this way’ as it was accidentally introduced by the Jovian Concord.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.3.1
patchlogs.fixes: Players that did not properly receive a weapon slot alongside their Gorgon Wraith may have experienced some issues when purchasing weapon slots since then.  This hotfix will properly fix this issue, and reward each account affected by this problem with a weapon slot on next login.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.changes:
The Gorgon series of weapons has had their damage increased in PvP.
All players that earned a Gorgon Wraith over the recent Survive or DIE event that did not receive an additional weapon slot have received a weapon slot retroactively, regardless if they have kept or sold the weapon.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Vaykor Hek now has 0.7 Disposition as intended with the Riven Disposition Changes from Update 24. When tweaking Riven Dispositions we missed the Vaykor Hek when changing the normal Hek

patchlogs.name: Chimera: Hotfix 23.10.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed larger Beam weapons (Opticor, etc) unable to hit weak points, such as Vay Hek as reported here: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1018929-opticor-does-no-damage-to-vay-hek-anymore/

patchlogs.name: Mask of the Revenant: Hotfix 23.8.2
patchlogs.changes: The infested boil that threatened the Plains is back, uglier and more putrid than before. Vay Hek possesses a toxin that can destroy the boil at the meteorite crash site, but he refuses to help. Steal his toxin and destroy the boil before the Infested make their way to Cetus.

patchlogs.name: Mask of the Revenant: Update 23.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Almost four years ago, Vay Hek launched an unprecedented attack on our Relays. We defeated his Fomorians, but not before three of our Relays were destroyed.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.1 - 22.17.1.1
patchlogs.changes:
Konzu has received reports that Vay Hek possesses a toxin that can destroy the boil. But Vay Hek won’t help; he sees this infested boil as a means to rid the Plains of Cetus and the Ostrons.
We need to get ahold of the toxin and destroy the boil before it becomes unstoppable. Visit Konzu in Cetus to learn his plan for retrieving the toxin from Vay Hek.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.changes:
You can now damage Vay Hek up to 25% of his total Health (was 10% previously) while his Propaganda Drone is active before it shuts off. This will result in less waiting around, and will make Vay Hek in Terra Frame easier to deal with.
Reduced base Armor of Vay Hek in his Terra Frame from 225 to 200.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a visual Bug with Vay Hek appearing fully formed during his Terra Frame transition.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed some enemy navigation issues at the entrance of Vay Hek’s Assassination boss room.
Fixes towards objective marker not guiding you to each stage of Vay Hek’s Assassination boss fight.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.changes: Reduced Vay Hek's zap Magnetic Status to not drain Energy completely.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.8.0 + Hotfix 22.8.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Vay Hek's personal favorite, the Devourer is a maximal terror unit. Draped in shreds of the diapause bag that birthed it, this gap-mawed monstrosity barrels toward prey with furious intensity. Wrist-mounted hooks are welded to elbow joints and hyperpowered by a myotechnological winch system for maximum impact-and-pull.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.3.0
patchlogs.changes:
Konzu has received reports that Vay Hek possesses a toxin that can destroy the boil. But Vay Hek won’t help; he sees this infested boil as a means to rid the Plains of Cetus and the Ostrons.
We need to get ahold of the toxin and destroy the boil before it becomes unstoppable. Visit Konzu in Cetus to learn his plan for retrieving the toxin from Vay Hek.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vay Hek not entering his Terra Frame phase if he hasn't been encountered the right number of times on the way to the boss room.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.2.0 + 21.2.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a case of Vay Hek not spawning in his Assassination mission.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.7
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Vay Hek not spawning 3 times before his final battle and not entering his Terra Frame Phase when playing his boss fight.
Fixed the water not draining for Clients after defeating Vay Hek on his Earth boss fight.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.6.2
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed the Hek Drone that spawns with The Grustrag 3 leaving immediately in The Law of Retribution.
Fixed the Hek Drone sometimes arriving as an Eximus unit, but also as a Corpus attack drone in The Law of Retribution.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vay Hek’s eye’s having the wrong materials applied to them and corrected the visuals on his teeth.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.changes: Vay Hek is now invulnerable in the opening scene of The Law of Retribution by default so that players can't damage and/or kill him as per:
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed a map hole exploit in Vay Hek’s boss fight.
Fixed explosive barrels in Vay Hek boss fight not showing proper effect for Clients.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to kill Sortie Vay Hek.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash that occurred during the Assassinate Vay Hek Sortie mission.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Vay Hek Terra Frame

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.changes: All friendly Index Specters are now equipped with the Tetra (farewell Twin Heks!).

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the ‘Vay Hek Frequency Triangulator’ missions appearing for players that still have the key in their inventory.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix: Lunaro 6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vay Hek’s armour not being affected by Corrosive procs.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.13.2
patchlogs.fixes:
Hek Sound Changes
As widely requested, Hek’s original sound has been restored and our Sound Team has made it work with the new weapon sound tech.
Our Audio Director, [DE]George, has provided insight into why we changed the Hek sound originally here: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/536444-hek-shooting-sound/?do=findComment&comment=7327137

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vay Hek’s radial explosion FX when landing in Terra form displaying at the wrong axis.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Hyena Pack, Tyl Regor, Vay Hek and Infested Alad V not properly giving Death Marks to players.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.changes: Increased the Vaykor Hek’s ammo pool in PvP.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.changes: The Obex, Dual Ether Daggers, Vaykor Hek and Ankyros series can now be used in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.changes: The Penta, Hek, and Cernos can now be used in PvP.
patchlogs.fixes: Steel Meridian: Vaykor Hek

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.1.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error that would prevent progress in the Vay Hek boss fight.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue preventing Vay Hek or the G3 from spawning in the Phase 2 of the Law of Retribution Trial.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Increased the time taken by AI to hack consoles in Trials from 2 seconds to 4 for the Vay Hek stage.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.5: Tubemen Of Regor
patchlogs.fixes:
Nightmare Trials are challenging encounters designed for experience groups of Tenno looking for a new challenge.  Harder hitting enemies, new traps and tweaks to each of the existing encounters in the Trials of Vay Hek will push your squad’s coordination to the limit.
Players can purchase the Nightmare Trial of Vay Hek Key from the Marketplace for 100,000 Credits.  Building a key costs 5000 Credits, 1000 Rubedo, 18000 Nanospores, and 2 Gallium.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.3: The New Protocols
patchlogs.fixes: Trials of Vay Hek Fixes

patchlogs.name: Update 16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Vay Hek now has immunity from Warframe powers when he is immune to damage.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue in the Trials of Vay Hek that cause the consoles in Phase 2 to become unhackable.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed further textures to be color blind friendly in PvP and the Trial of Vay Hek.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.1: Volt Prime
patchlogs.fixes:
Added colorblind pipe variants for the Trials of Vay Hek.
Fixed rare Synthesis targets spawning in Trials of Vay Hek.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Vay Hek is no longer vulnerable to Trinity’s Energy Vampire (like other bosses).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.2
patchlogs.changes: ·         Removed exits from Vay Hek boss fight in Law of Retribution.
patchlogs.fixes: ·         Fixed Vay Hek still broadcasting his threats to Relays.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed crash that could occur during Vay Hek and Vor boss fights.
Fixed Halo Badge not being handed out when completing the Trials of Vay Hek.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.additions: Added Boss Sigils for Nef Anyo, Jackal, Vay Hek and Tyl Regor.
patchlogs.fixes:
Tenno are out for vengeance, and Grineer Councilor Vay Hek has nowhere left to hide.  Hot on his trail after the assault on Relays during Eyes of Blight, the Lotus will guide a precision strike force to hunt down and put an end to Vay Hek once and for all.  Be wary Tenno.  Numbers alone will not protect you when diving into the heart of Grineer military power.
Create a squad of 4 to 8 Tenno and work through three challenge scenarios as you track down Vay Hek across the Solar System.
Earn Arcane enhancements from defeating Vay Hek, each of which provide a unique bonus Warframes can unleash during combat.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.14.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players receiving inbox messages regarding Vey Hek Frequency Triangulator Blueprints.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.additions: Councillor Vay Hek will no longer require a key to access. He is now a boss on Earth that can only be accessed by Mastery Rank 5 and above Tenno.  Vey Hek beacons and Key / Key Blueprints may one day serve a future purpose...

patchlogs.name: Update 15.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Vay Hek is making his move. We have just detected a Balor Fomorian traveling on an interception course with Vesper Relay. The beast moves slowly but if we allow it to get within firing range, it will surely obliterate our new Relay. We need to destroy it before that happens.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Hek Shotgun Syndicate mod being 500% multishot instead of 50%

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.changes: Hek: Scattered Justice: adds 50% multishot

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where Vay Hek would become invulnerable during the boss fight.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.7.0: Operation Gate Crash!
patchlogs.fixes:
Our mission is urgent. The Grineer have also learned about the Archwing Technology and they are determined to destroy all traces of it before we find it. To do this, Vay Hek is using Void Keys and Torsion Beam Generators to force open Orokin portals.
Careful, Tenno. Vay Hek is using unstable keys. Cumulative exposure to the keys will have detrimental effects on your health, shields and Warframe abilities. Proceed accordingly.
Fixed an issue with the Savior of Earth achievement not unlocking properly after beating Vay Hek.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.5: Operation Cryotic Front!
patchlogs.fixes: • Fixed Infested Ancients and Grineer Scorpions from using their grapple pull ability on Saryn's Molt avatar and Loki's Decoy avatar as it would not behave well (would have them pause for a few moments, if Molt was used again it would script error and break the enemy). This also fixes a similar issue with Vay Hek’s beam-zap attack.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where you could remain trapped in the Vay Hek boss room.

patchlogs.name: Update 14: The Mad Cephalon
patchlogs.changes: Grustrag 3, Hyena Pack, Vay Hek, Jackal, Alad V and Zanuka, Sargas Ruk, Lephantis, and Captain Vor.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.4.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated the textures on the Hek.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.changes: Vay Hek can no longer be affected by mind control abilities.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.0.6+13.0.7+13.0.7.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Vay Hek's terrify ability affecting unintended targets (allies).
Fixed an issue with Vay Hek getting stuck under the tram when fighting him.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.0.4
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an number of map holes in the Vay Hek boss battle room.
Fixed an issue with Water visuals persisting during Vay Hek's death cinematic.
Fixed a Lotus subtitle seen during the Hijack missions incorrectly showing Project Tethra instead of Vay Hek.

patchlogs.name: Update 13: Dark Sectors
patchlogs.changes: Oberon pieces have been moved off Vay Hek to make room for Hydroid, and now have a chance to drop from Grineer Leader enemy types.
patchlogs.fixes: Prosecutors: Gateways to Hek.Tenno, we have received word that Vay Hek has enlisted the ranks of the Grineer Prosecutors and Guardsmen to keep the Tenno at bay.To fight Vay Hek players must first find his location, a secret the Prosecutors protect.

patchlogs.name: Update 12.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Disable the Fomorian Fleet and stop Vay Hek's plans! https://warframe.com/news/tethras-doom-now

patchlogs.name: Update 12.3.0: The Grustrag Three
patchlogs.fixes: Update 12.3.0: The Grustrag ThreeAdditions:Vem Tabook, Shik Tal and Leekter. Remember their names, Tenno. They may be coming for you!Vay Hek has warned that any Tenno supporting the Corpus during invasions will face consequences; we now know what those consequences are. Riddled with mutation, violent tendencies and the urge to kill, these Grineer defects

patchlogs.name: Update 12: Zephyr Rises
patchlogs.changes: Hek damage increased and more minimum damage added to falloff.

patchlogs.name: Update 11.5.0: The Cicero Crisis.
patchlogs.fixes: New Warframe: OBERON – the Paladin Warframe! Equally adept at healing friends or striking down the enemy. Oberon embodies the balance Tenno are sworn to uphold. Find him today by fighting Vay Hek!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.8.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed broken text appearing in main menu after defeating Vay Hek

patchlogs.name: Update 9.5: Operation Arid Fear
patchlogs.changes: Added custom reload sounds for Strun, Dera, Supra, Gorgon, Ignis, Grakata, Acrid, Kraken, Hek, and Lex.

patchlogs.name: Update 7.10.0: Weekend Extermination Event!
patchlogs.changes: All Shotguns get a boost, effective range increased. Hek is boosted further than Strun and Boar.

patchlogs.name: 7.7.1 Hot-Fix + "about Last Night..."
patchlogs.fixes: -Restored missing sounds (Hek).

patchlogs.name: Update 5.4 - "Hammer Time" (Preview)
patchlogs.changes: Balance changes for Gorgon and Hek.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some issues reported with the Hema Ammo mechanic. Essentially increasing Clip size Mods or reducing max Ammo Mods would affect the Ammo pool leading to incomplete clip reloads. Also, the Ammo pool could get into a bad state if you were knocked back/down while in the reload animation.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ignis’ Energy color appearing defaulted in reflections when in mission.

End point of Ignis weapons are now 1m from 3m in Conclave.
Ignis magazine capacity reduced to 30 in Conclave.
Ignis Wraith mag capacity reduced to 40 in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Ignis and Ignis Wraith are now usable in Conclave.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ignis (and similar weapons) being able to damage friendly Gara's Spectrorage mirrors.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.4.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed continuous weapons (Ignis, etc) getting extreme Range when used in Limbo’s Stasis.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed continuous weapons (Ignis, etc) receiving extreme Range when used with Limbo’s Stasis.
Fixed an issue with the Ignis Wraith Research being available for unqualified clans. Any clans with this will have it removed following a script. 4/20/2017 Update: The Script has been run and 1644 Clans have had the unearned research removed.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed trading for the Ignis Wraith Blueprint resulting in having the Ignis Wraith Research in an unqualified Dojo.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash when firing the Ignis while in Limbo’s Stasis.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an outdated model of the Ignis being visible in the Clan Training Diorama.
Fixed the Ignis firing FX sometime not showing up if you tap the fire button.
Fixed issue where players could get hit and take fire Proc damage when outside FX range of Scorch's Ignis.
Fixed Hyekka Master and Scorch’s firing their Ignis’ too high.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.1+19.12.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Hyekka Master being able to hit Limbo in the Rift with her Ignis if there are other enemies around Limbo.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.changes: Ignis flame FX and the transition of Ignis’ flame particles fading on ceasefire has been visually improved!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.13.2
patchlogs.fixes: Hyekka Masters: Fixed the Hyekka Master’s Ignis dealing damage through walls.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.8.1
patchlogs.changes: •    Reduced the Hyekka Master’s Ignis damage by almost half and reduced the status chance by 10%.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed Hush and Hushed Invisibility not applying to the Ignis.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes:
Slightly adjusted the Ignis’ audio FX.
Fixed the Grakata, Prisma Grakata, and Embolist improperly using the Ignis’ reload animation.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.3.1 + 18.3.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an improper fire visual FX that would appear on the Ignis in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.additions: The Ignis has received a visual overhaul and has received the following stat changes:
patchlogs.fixes: The Twin Basolk are nasty little hatchets that slice through steel as if it were flesh and the Ignis gets a completely new look!

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clients seeing the Javlok explosion after the enemy falls to the ground and the Javlok floating a couple feet from the point of actual impact.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed the Javlok no longer sticking inside of enemies that did not die from the javelin.
Fixed the Javlok marker not displaying if Transferring to Operator before the Javlok lands.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Blade Storm not removing the temporary melee weapon given to Ash if the only weapon he has is a Speargun (Javlok, Scourge, etc) and he's currently thrown the Speargun out when activating Blade Storm.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the collision size of Javlok's primary fire projectile in Conclave.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Javlok and the Ferrox alt fire playing their holstering animation after throwing.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Reloading can now be interrupted by throwing the Javlok, and can be thrown after depleting all primary fire without having to wait for it to fully reload.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.4.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Javlok consuming ammo from throwing while having the Void Fissure Reactant Buff (infinite ammo).

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Removed the explosion delay from Javlok's spear when thrown fully charged. Quick throw retains the delay to facilitate getting out of range before it detonates.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Javlok playing a weird animation when quickly cycling through ‘Randomized’ color options.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed playing a holstering animation after throwing the Javlok or Ferrox.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.4.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a memory leak when throwing the Javlok/Ferrox in Limbo’s Stasis.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.4.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed experiencing a crash after throwing the Javlok in the air then Transferring to the Operator.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.3.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the damage of the Javlok in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the collision size of the Javlok primary fire projectile in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes: Javlok, Buzlok, Ferrox, Harpak, Hind, Mutalist Quanta, Penthera, Paracyst, Penta, Quanta (Vandal), Stradavar, Tenora, Zarr
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a visual bug for Clients where the charged shots of the Opticor, Angstrum, Javlok, or Ferrox would appear to fire twice.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.13.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Clients being able to throw multiple Javloks and Ferroxs which are then unable to be picked back up.
Fixed the Javlok not dealing AoE damage upon throwing it as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/771079-javlok-lost-its-primary-fire-aoe-damage-with-update-1813/
Fixed Adhesive Blast not causing the Javlok explosion to stick and pause for a while (through primary fire).

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed the Javlok disappearing when being thrown into water.
Fixed the Javlok not having a firing animation when on a zipline and also not being able to throw it.
Fixed missing pickup sounds for the Javlok.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.1+19.12.1.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Ash’s Noble/Agile animations not functioning properly with the Javlok. 
Fixed Equinox’s Noble/Agile animations not functioning properly with the Javlok.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Update 19.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the primary fire damage of the Javlok in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.changes: Javlok's projectile collision size has been increased, making it easier to land hits while also dealing 50 Heat AoE damage in a 1.6m radius.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Javlok disappearing after being thrown if you left the room.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.6.0 + 19.6.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Client and Host seeing the Javlok in different positions once thrown.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.4
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted Charged Javlok throw return to holster time to be the same as its quick throw in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.4.2 + 19.4.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Javlok not keeping appearance customization when thrown.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.4 + 19.4.1
patchlogs.fixes: Set your enemies in flames with the Javlok. Complete this loadout by adding the Laddak Cloak and Boloket Sugatra. Customize your Warframe with a new round of community-created TennoGen items on the Steam Workshop!

Kohmak 
Like the larger Kohm, this hand-shotgun doubles its volley with every successive shot.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes:
Reduced particle effect trails for Kohm’s projectiles.
Adjusted the Kohm to shoot a maximum of 5 pellets, in addition to dropping the fire rate but boosting projectile damage to compensate for dps.  This should keep the Kohm’s damage relatively unchanged, while helping cut down on the graphical latency caused by the weapon.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.10.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced fire rate of Kohm in full auto, but boosted projectile damage to compensate.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Kohm:  The Kohm is a primary plasma shotgun with a unique held-trigger function.  For every shot fired in rapid succession the Kohm releases an additional bolt, growing more lethal with every pull of the trigger!

name: Komorex
description: Corpus ingenuity leveraging Tau-tech to create a high-capacity bi-modal sniper weapon of terrifying capability. Zoom in to reduce recoil and add punch through. Zoom again to fire a bursting viral round, but with a lower rate of fire. Komorex features built-in ammo conversion.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Update 27
patchlogs.changes: Increased projectile speed of the Kuva Ayanga while in space.

patchlogs.name: The Old Blood: Hotfix 26.0.7
patchlogs.changes:
Reduced the camera shake of the Kuva Ayanga explosions.
Fixed Kuva Lich weapons that do damage on both impact and explosion (Kuva Ogris, Kuva Ayanga, etc) doing significantly less overall damage than expected. This was due to the Elemental bonus only being applied to the "on impact" of the projectile itself and not the explosion.

patchlogs.name: The Old Blood: Hotfix 26.0.6 + 26.0.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Valence Transfer not applying to the Kuva Shildeg and Kuva Ayanga.

name: Kuva Bramma
description: This Grineer bow delivers vengeance in the form of clusterbomb-tipped arrows that can be detonated mid-air or on impact. Low quiver capacity, arrows are recovered singly.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: This Grineer bow delivers vengeance in the form of clusterbomb-tipped arrows that can be detonated mid-air or on impact. Low quiver capacity, arrows are recovered singly.

patchlogs.name: Derelict Shift: Update 28.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed arrows being misplaced when equipping the Dryad Bow Skin on the Kuva Bramma.

patchlogs.name: Update 28: The Deadlock Protocol
patchlogs.changes: The Kuva Bramma has received balance changes to address it’s overwhelming chart topping usage. The Kuva Bramma still goes boom, and we look forward to your feedback once you’ve given it a try.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Railjack Revisited (Part 1): Update 27.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Kuva Bramma’s projectiles not getting pulled into Mag’s Magnetize and instead bouncing off of the area and yeeting into the sky.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: Titania Prime 27.3.6
patchlogs.changes: This is to address that Split Flight cannot be equipped on the Lenz, Kuva Bramma, or Ivara’s Artemis Bow.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Hotfix 27.2.2
patchlogs.changes:
Corinth and Kuva Bramma remain unchanged.
Removed unnecessary dud grenade FX on the Kuva Bramma cluster bombs.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Update 27.2.0
patchlogs.changes:
Fixed the Kuva Nukor, Kuva Hind, and Kuva Bramma weapon progression showing as complete in the Codex when at Rank 30 instead of it’s true completed Rank of 40.
This retroactively fixes the Kuva weapons that lost out on their innate bonus damage by giving them back their random buff. Unfortunately, the Kuva Lich name can’t be easily associated with the Kuva weapon, so these fixed weapons will have the default Kuva weapon name (Kuva Tonkor, Kuva Bramma, etc). 
Fixed small FX offset issues with the Kuva Bramma when reloading. 
Removed camera shake and color correction for other players in your squad when firing the Kuva Bramma for less eye bleed!
patchlogs.fixes: A player who has not yet completed 'Rising Tide' will find building their Railjack a lot easier. A player with an extensive Arcane collection will see most Arcanes can now achieve 5 Ranks, and duplicates can no longer be equipped together. A player using the Kuva Bramma will notice Self Damage is gone. A player with Multishot mods equipped should see some changes in their Upgrade Menus with the addition of a new Multishot Stat.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Prime Vault 27.1.2
patchlogs.fixes:
Optimized the Kuva Bramma cluster bombs with and without Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors, to address issues with crashing due to FX overload.
Fixed the Kuva Bramma multi shot sound FX spamming.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Prime Vault 27.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed the Kuva Bramma from Conclave eligibility due to not being Conclave balanced yet.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva Bramma explosion and projectile sounds being too loud for non local players.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Hotfix 27.2.2
patchlogs.changes: Lenz: 70%

patchlogs.name: The Old Blood: Prime Vault 26.0.8 + 26.0.8.1
patchlogs.additions: Added a new Arsenal stat titled ‘Embed Delay’. Some Area of Effect weapons, like the Zakti or the Lenz, have a delayed explosion after the projectile has hit its target. Embed Delay is the time it takes after impact until the projectile explodes.

patchlogs.name: Saint of Altra: Update 25.7.0
patchlogs.changes: When tracking down a bug why Paris Bows were doing less Damage than their Arsenal stats indicated, internal stats were reporting all Bows doing more damage than they actually were. Below is a review of all Bows (with the exception of the Lenz) and increased stats where appropriate:

patchlogs.name: Wukong Deluxe: Update 25.5.0 + 25.5.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the default holster position of the Lenz Quiver so it sits closer to Warframe's backs.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Update 25.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Bow Dryad Skin having misaligned strings when equipped on the Lenz.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.0.8

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.9 + 24.2.9.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Spare Parts Mod triggering from self-inflicted death (Lenz, etc), which allowed it’s chance function of dropping a Rare Item to trigger repeatedly at your leisure.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Update 24.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Rolling Guard Mod not protecting oneself from self-inflicted Lenz Status Effects.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.5.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors not making the strap on Lenz's quiver go invisible.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.3.0
patchlogs.changes:
Eradicate the enemy with the Lenz!
Bolts from this Corpus bow deliver a one-two punch of an icy pulse, followed by a conventional explosion. Excess ammo picked up for other weapons will be converted into charges for the Lenz. Warning, safety-protocols do not exist on this prototype.
Research the Lenz Blueprint in the Clan Dojo Energy Lab or get it in the Market.

name: Mausolon
description: An ancient weapon designed by the Entrati for use by their Necramechs. Primary fire siphons life essence from the target to fuel a devastating alt fire. Punishing automatic primary fire and an alt mode that charges up to unleash a destructive beam of energy with a large explosion at point of impact.

Ogris: 80%

patchlogs.name: The Old Blood: Hotfix 26.0.7
patchlogs.changes:
Increased the base damage (before elemental bonus) of the Kuva Ogris from 454 to 714.
Fixed Kuva Lich weapons that do damage on both impact and explosion (Kuva Ogris, Kuva Ayanga, etc) doing significantly less overall damage than expected. This was due to the Elemental bonus only being applied to the "on impact" of the projectile itself and not the explosion.

patchlogs.name: The Old Blood: Hotfix 26.0.6 + 26.0.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Kuva Ogris not creating a fireball or any fire FX on impact if the Nightwatch Napalm Mod is equipped.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.7.0
patchlogs.changes: •    The Ogris can now be used in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes: Updated Ogris visual impact and muzzle flash FX.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an extended delay that occurs with the Ogris when attempting to fire the weapon after cancelling a charged shot.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue enabling players to mantle recently fired Ogris rockets.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a bug where the Adhesive Blast mod would cause Ogris missiles to pass through enemies, doors, loot-crates etc.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.1.0 - 17.1.4
patchlogs.changes: This bundle of Nightwatch Skins suits the Ack & Brunt, Ogris and Nukor. They have been modeled after the camouflage employed by the Nightwatch Corps, an elite squadron in the Grineer Military.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Ogris’ rockets not exploding properly when used with the Adhesive blast Mod.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the range and impact of explosions caused by the Ogris’ rockets.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed fire rate Mods not allowing charge weapons like the Ogris or Opticor to fire.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: ·         Fixed Ogris charging effects and firing animation not displaying properly.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing explosion effect from Ogris.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixes reported cases of clients not being able to damage enemies caught in Vortex when using the Ogris, Torid, etc.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.2.0: Avalanche Offensive

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.3
